TopicTitle: How to take samples of Breaking Ground surface features

Articles.Content: As the title says. Is there a special tool or something that's needed to take a sample? I've landed kerbals on Minmus and found a green rock but I can't figure out how to interact with it at all.

For small surface features, like a Mun Rock, standing next to it adds an option to the right click menu for kerbals. For larger surface features, like an Olivine Formation on Minmus, you need a scanning arm. Scanning arms come in three sizes, with larger arms giving more science points.
Ah, I think I must've found one of the larger ones then.

Another issue is that for some of the small features the right click menu option only shows up if the Kerbal is at a "correct" position relative to that feature. So if it doesn't show up then walk around and over that thingy until the option to pick it up shows up.
